生病老死: (せいびょうろうし) - birth, illness, old age and death
生白い: (なまじろい) - pale; pallid; wan; pasty
生真面目: (きまじめ) - (yoji) too serious; person who is too serious; honesty; sincerity
生砂: (きずな) - greensand (olive-green sandstone); green sand/molding sand
生禅: (なまぜん) - self-styled Zen philosophy; sciolism; dabbling in Zen
生立ち: (おいたち) - growth/development; one's early life/upbringing/personal history
生節: (なまぶし) - boiled and half-dried bonito
生粋: (kissui) - puro, genuíno, de nascença verdadeira, nato
生老病死: (しょうろうびょうし) - (yoji)  the four inevitables in human life (birth, aging, sickness, and death)
生者: (せいしゃ) - animate nature/living things; (usu. せいじゃ or せいしゃ) living person/the living
生者必滅: (しょうじゃひつめつ) - (yoji) All living things must die
生肉: (なまにく) - raw meat; fresh meat
生育: (せいいく) - birth and growth; giving birth and raising; development; breeding
生脚: (なまあし) - bare legs; bare feet; stockingless legs
生臭: (なまぐさ) - something that smells of fish or blood; meat and fish; degenerate monk/corrupt priest
生臭い: (なまぐさい) - smelling of fish/fishy/smelling of blood/bloody; degenerate (of a monk)/depraved/corrupt/fallen; worldly/mundane/secular/common/ordinary; fishy/suspicious/questionable
生臭坊主: (なまぐさぼうず) - (yoji) degenerate monk; corrupt priest
生臭物: (なまぐさもの) - meat and fish (forbidden to monks)
生花: (せいか) - flower arrangement; (せいか only) fresh flowers
生茂る: (おいしげる) - to grow thickly; to be overgrown; to thrive; to grow in abundance
生菌: (せいきん) - live bacteria; live virus; viable fungus
生菌ワクチン: (せいきんワクチン) - live vaccine
生菓子: (なまがし) - fresh Japanese sweets (usu. containing red bean paste); fresh Western sweets (usu. containing cream or fruit, e.g. sponge cake, pie)
生蕎麦: (なまそば) - fresh buckwheat noodles (not dried)
生薑酢: (しょうがず) - vinegar mixed with ginger juice and soy sauce, etc.
生薬: (せいやく) - crude drug; crude medicine; natural remedy
生計を立てる: (せいけいをたてる) - to make a living
生計費指数: (せいけいひしすう) - cost of living index

生貝: (なまがい) - sliced abalone served in cold water; raw shellfish
生販在: (せいはんざい) - production, sales and inventory; PSI
生販在計画: (せいはんざいけいかく) - sales, inventory and production planning; SIPP
生足: (なまあし) - bare legs; bare feet; stockingless legs
生身: (しょうじん) - living flesh/flesh and blood; (しょうじん only)  physical body of Buddha or a bodhisattva
生返る: (いきかえる) - to revive; to come to oneself; to be restored to life
生返事: (なまへんじ) - half-hearted reply; vague answer; reluctant answer
生還: (せいかん) - returning alive; {baseb} reaching the home plate
生酔い本性違わず: (なまよいほんしょうたがわず) - In wine there is truth
生酛: (きもと) - traditional sake yeast mash starter; oldest surviving traditional style of sake making
